description.value:
Requirements You have a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Restrained]{Restrained}.

You pinch crucial points of your target's nervous system, impeding its ability to function. Attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapple} the creature, with the following success and critical success effects instead of the usual effects.

Critical Success: The target falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Unconscious]{Unconscious} for 1 minute, though it remains standing and doesn't drop what it holds.

Success: The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until the end of its next turn.
